text: Alexandar John Richardson (born 30 April 1990) is a British cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . A former stockbroker, Richardson began cycling during mid-2015, and took a surprise solo win in the 2018 Lincoln Grand Prix, a couple of weeks after leaving the team. In 2019, Richardson rejoined the team he had competed for in 2017, and won the Arno Wallaard Memorial and a stage of the Tour de la Mirabelle. For 2020, he joined the team. ==Major results== ;2018 : 1st Lincoln Grand Prix ;2019 : 1st Arno Wallaard Memorial : 1st Stage 3 Tour de la Mirabelle : 6th Road race, National Road Championships : 6th Ronde van Overijssel ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:English male cyclists
title: Alexandar Richardson
